name: Bare
description: Single page application skeleton for production and development in 2015.

scripts.link: rm -f ./node_modules/components; rm -f ./node_modules/constants; rm -f ./node_modules/stores; rm -f ./node_modules/utilities; ln -s ../client/components ./node_modules/components; ln -s ../client/constants ./node_modules/constants; ln -s ../client/stores ./node_modules/stores; ln -s ../client/utilities ./node_modules/utilities;
scripts.production: npm run link; NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.production.js;
scripts.deploy: npm run link; npm run production; PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=production node server;

author: Jimmy Lee @meanJim
